translations: n.短纤维，废毛铁；絮凝物，絮状沉淀

sentences.sentence: They came in flocks to see the procession.
sentences.translation: 他们成群结队来看游行队伍。

sentences.sentence: These cases all attracted flocks of famous writers.
sentences.translation: 这些案例均吸引了大批知名作家。

sentences.sentence: During the winter months, great flocks of gulls gather at landfills and sewage outfalls.
sentences.translation: 冬季时大群大群的海鸥会聚集在垃圾场和排污口。
